issue.title: [JS] JSON reader fails on FixedSizeBinary data buffer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2356](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2356). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The JSON reader doesn't ingest the FixedSizeBinary data buffer correctly, and we haven't known about it because the JS integration test runner is accidentally exiting with code 0 on failures.
